Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection

Class MessageHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.connection.MessageHandler
public class MessageHandler extends Object
Handles incoming messages and invokes the appropriate methods in the controller based on the message type.

  • Constructor Summary

      public MessageHandler(Controller controller, SocketMap socketMap)
      Constructs a new MessageHandler object.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller responsible for handling game logic.
      socketMap - The map of sockets and their corresponding identifiers.

  • Method Details

    • receive

      public void receive(TCPMessage TCPmessage, Connection connection) throws RemoteException, InvalidIdException, GameFullException, NameAlreadyExistentException, InvalidGameIdException, UnavaiableCommandException, GameModeException, NumPlayersException, EmptyHandException, NotInGameException, WrongTurnException, InvalidColumnPutException, NotEnoughSpacePutException, WrongLengthOrderException, WrongContentOrderException, NotLinearPickException, LimitReachedPickException, NotCatchablePickException, EmptySlotPickException, OutOfBoardPickException, InvalidNameException, GameFinishedException, AlreadyConnectedException, GameLeftException
      Processes the received TCP message and invokes the corresponding controller methods based on the message type.
      Parameters:
      TCPmessage - The TCP message received.
      connection - The connection from which the message was received.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs.
      InvalidIdException - If an invalid player identifier is encountered.
      GameFullException - If the game is already full.
      NameAlreadyExistentException - If a player with the same name already exists.
      InvalidGameIdException - If an invalid game identifier is encountered.
      UnavaiableCommandException - If an unavailable command is encountered.
      GameModeException - If an invalid game mode is encountered.
      NumPlayersException - If an invalid number of players is encountered.
      EmptyHandException - If a player's hand is empty.
      NotInGameException - If a player is not in the game.
      WrongTurnException - If it is not the player's turn.
      InvalidColumnPutException - If an invalid column for placing an item is encountered.
      NotEnoughSpacePutException - If there is not enough space in the selected column to place the item.
      WrongLengthOrderException - If an order with an invalid length is encountered.
      WrongContentOrderException - If an order with invalid content is encountered.
      NotLinearPickException - If a non-linear pick is encountered in a linear pick phase.
      LimitReachedPickException - If the pick limit has been reached.
      NotCatchablePickException - If a non-catchable item is encountered.
      EmptySlotPickException - If an empty slot is encountered during picking.
      OutOfBoardPickException - If an out-of-board slot is encountered during picking.
      InvalidNameException - If an invalid player name is encountered.
      GameFinishedException - If the game has already finished.
      AlreadyConnectedException - If a player is already connected.
      GameLeftException - If a player has already left the game.
